title.narrative: 2022 - Plan and organise meetings of the EORE Advisory group /Assist co-chair with the production and implementation of the EORE AG annual work plan/Coordinate and disseminate EORE AG information, meeting minutes, events, and relevant documents
Plan and organise meetings of the EORE Advisory group

comment.narrative: At least 3 annual meetings of the EORE AG
The EORE AG held two meetings in March 2022, one of which was entirely dedicated to addressing emergency EORE needs in Ukraine and Tigray.

title.narrative: Coordinate and disseminate EORE AG information, meeting minutes, events, and relevant documents

dimension.name: Relevant information circulated in timely manner and EORE data systematically collected

comment.narrative: This information is collected through the annual EORE Stakeholder Survey, for which results are available in Q1 of the following year. Results for 2022 are therefore expected in the final quarterly report of the year.

title.narrative: Assist co-chair with the production and implementation of the EORE AG annual work plan

comment.narrative: The EORE AG continues to implement its 2021-2022 Work Plan, which was extended to 2022 in October last year.

title.narrative: 2021 - Yearly workplan produced and implemented / At least 3 annual meetings of the EORE AG / Relevant information circulated in timely manner and EORE data systematically collected

Number of AG meetings organised / Annual work plan produced, adopted and implemented reflecting the needs and responding to the challenges of the EORE sector / Number of stakeholders that have access to methods, tools or approaches developed, promoted or shared by the EORE

comment.narrative: EORE AG work plan for 2021 was adopted in March and implementation is ongoing. In October 2021, the EORE AG voted to extend the 2021 work plan to the end of 2022.

target.value: 10 stakeholders that have access to methods, tools or approaches developed, promoted or shared by the EORE AG per year

comment.narrative: In the 2021 EORE AG Stakeholder Survey, representatives of 21 organisations or countries self-reported adopting methods, tools or approaches developed, promoted or shared by the EORE AG.
The three annual meetings of the EORE AG were held in February, June and October 2021.

target.value: 10 stakeholders that have access to methods, tools or approaches developed, promoted or shared by the EORE AG per year

comment.narrative: This information is collected through the annual EORE Stakeholder Survey, for which results are available in Q1 of the following year. First results (for 2021) are therefore expected in Q1 2022.
